text: František Hanec Pivec was a male Czech international table tennis player. He won a bronze medal at the 1936 World Table Tennis Championships in the team event and another bronze in 1937 World Table Tennis Championships doubles with Miloslav Hamr. ==See also== * List of table tennis players * List of World Table Tennis Championships medalists ==References== Category:Czech male table tennis players Category:World Table Tennis Championships medalists
title: František Hanec Pivec
